scripts.build: rm -rf dist && next build && mkdir dist && cp -R .next dist && cp -R public dist && cp -R server dist && cp package.json dist && cp package-lock.json dist
scripts.build:win: rimraf dist && next build && mkdir dist && xcopy /i /e .next dist\.next && xcopy /i /e public dist\public && xcopy /i /e server dist\server && copy package.json dist && copy package-lock.json dist
